results.title: A systematic review: the appraisal of the effects of metformin on lipoprotein modification and function
results.text_hl: Through the mechanisms that were elaborated on in the preceding two paragraphs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is able to inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Hypoalphalipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052456 @@@HDL dysfunction@@@.
